Property.name: createLinkText
Property.comment: The default text for the create link prompt

Property.name: defaultLinkValue
Property.comment: The default value for the create link prompt (defaults to http:/ /)

Property.name: enableAlignments
Property.comment: Enable the left, center, right alignment buttons (defaults to true)

Property.name: enableColors
Property.comment: Enable the fore/highlight color buttons (defaults to true)

Property.name: enableFont
Property.comment: Enable font selection. Not available in Safari. (defaults to true)

Property.name: enableFontSize
Property.comment: Enable the increase/decrease font size buttons (defaults to true)

Property.name: enableFormat
Property.comment: Enable the bold, italic and underline buttons (defaults to true)

Property.name: enableLinks
Property.comment: Enable the create link button. Not available in Safari. (defaults to true)

Property.name: enableLists
Property.comment: Enable the bullet and numbered list buttons. Not available in Safari. (defaults to true)

Property.name: enableSourceEdit
Property.comment: Enable the switch to source edit button. Not available in Safari. (defaults to true)

Property.name: fontFamilies
Property.comment: An array of available font families

Event.name: activate
Event.comment: Fires when the editor is first receives the focus. Any insertion must wait until after this event.

Event.name: beforepush
Event.comment: Fires before the iframe editor is updated with content from the textarea. Return false to cancel the push.

Event.name: beforesync
Event.comment: Fires before the textarea is updated with content from the editor iframe. Return false to cancel the sync.

Event.name: editmodechange
Event.comment: Fires when the editor switches edit modes

Param.name: sourceEdit
Param.comment: True if source edit, false if standard editing.

Event.name: initialize
Event.comment: Fires when the editor is fully initialized (including the iframe)

Event.name: push
Event.comment: Fires when the iframe editor is updated with content from the textarea.

Event.name: sync
Event.comment: Fires when the textarea is updated with content from the editor iframe.
